Posts.EditableText:
Hello everyone. I have been working on a game  called Monster Fighter. Its a pokemon type game, but I got permission from Monsters MMORPG to use there art work since this is not for profit. And some fan made art too. But here is a shot of some prototype battle play. If this game will be liked and played there will be lots more added to it.

<https://imgur.com/9Pi8yTa> 

I hope to have it in beta phase in a few days ;)
Posts.HTML:
Hello everyone. I have been working on a game called Monster Fighter. Its a pokemon type game, but I got permission from Monsters MMORPG to use there art work since this is not for profit. And some fan made art too. But here is a shot of some prototype battle play. If this game will be liked and played there will be lots more added to it.

https://imgur.com/9Pi8yTa

I hope to have it in beta phase in a few days ;)
